${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MarkThePath.NAME: Mark The Path
${modID}:MarkThePath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a random card from your hand into ${modID}:Stasis. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Shuffle !M! Voids into your draw pile.
${modID}:MarkThePath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a card from your hand into ${modID}:Stasis. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Shuffle !M! Voids into your draw pile.

${modID}:MementosBlade.NAME: Memento's Blade
${modID}:MementosBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to EVERYONE.

${modID}:MinorBeams.NAME: Minor Beams
${modID}:MinorBeams.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a 1 cost copy of this card to your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.
${modID}:MinorBeams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Upgraded 1 cost copy of this card to your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${modID}:GhostlyMittens.NAME: Ghostly Mittens
${modID}:GhostlyMittens.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PowerSurge.NAME: Power Surge
${modID}:PowerSurge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw 2 less cards.
${modID}:PowerSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw 2 less cards. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.

${modID}:SmashAndSave.NAME: Smash and Save
${modID}:SmashAndSave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Accelerate ALL cards in ${modID}:Stasis.

${modID}:SiftingThroughMemories.NAME: Memory Sifting
${modID}:SiftingThroughMemories.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, ${modID}:Accelerate.
${modID}:SiftingThroughMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, ${modID}:Accelerate.

${modID}:RaceToTheBottom.NAME: Race To The Bottom
${modID}:RaceToTheBottom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable, Weak, and Frail.

${modID}:NobJumpscare.NAME: Nob Jumpscare
${modID}:NobJumpscare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are Vulnerable, attack twice.

${modID}:RageEscalating.NAME: Rage Escalating
${modID}:RageEscalating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain 1 Strength.
${modID}:RageEscalating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain 1 Strength.
${modID}:RageEscalating.FLAVOR: Right on the road to your sadness...

${modID}:OpeningWrath.NAME: Opening Wrath
${modID}:OpeningWrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! to the damaged enemy's Weak and Vulnerable.

${modID}:DetailedEssay.NAME: Detailed Essay
${modID}:DetailedEssay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! Attacks you play this turn draw a card.

${modID}:BossHatred.NAME: Boss Hatred
${modID}:BossHatred.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy has negative Focus, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:NextBuildFix.NAME: Next Build Fix
${modID}:NextBuildFix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL *Exhaust a card. NL Next turn, gain a copy of the *Exhausted card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card for Next Build Fix.

${modID}:SuspendingDisbelief.NAME: Suspending Disbelief
${modID}:SuspendingDisbelief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your ${modID}:Stasis slots are full, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

${modID}:WorkingToFloat.NAME: Working To Float
${modID}:WorkingToFloat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL When *Exhausted, add a 0 cost copy of this card to your hand.
${modID}:WorkingToFloat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL When *Exhausted, add an *Upgraded 0 cost copy of this card to your hand.

${modID}:PassItAround.NAME: Pass It Around
${modID}:PassItAround.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL At the end of combat, gain a random ${modID}:Pickup relic.

${modID}:DeveloperForm.NAME: Developer Form
${modID}:DeveloperForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of each turn, discard any number of cards and draw that many.
${modID}:DeveloperForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, discard any number of cards and draw that many.

${modID}:MistakesOfThePast.NAME: Mistakes of the Past
${modID}:MistakesOfThePast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. ${modID}:Afterlife. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When *Exhausted, NL gain !M! ${modID}:Blur.

${modID}:MoraleBooster.NAME: Morale Booster
${modID}:MoraleBooster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength.

${modID}:ProbingJab.NAME: Probing Jab
${modID}:ProbingJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:Wash.NAME: Wash
${modID}:Wash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

${modID}:LeapingSlam.NAME: Leaping Slam
${modID}:LeapingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL If you have ${modID}:Infection, repeat these effects once.

${modID}:ParryingFlail.NAME: Parrying Flail
${modID}:ParryingFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !${modID}:M2! temporary Thorns.

${modID}:Amalgamation.NAME: Amalgamation
${modID}:Amalgamation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Retain up to !${modID}:M2! cards this turn.

${modID}:InfectiousCascade.NAME: Infectious Cascade
${modID}:InfectiousCascade.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !${modID}:M2! ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ToughCleanse.NAME: Tough Cleanse
${modID}:ToughCleanse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ToughCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

${modID}:VirtuousRepentance.NAME: Virtuous Repentance
${modID}:VirtuousRepentance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

${modID}:BlessingOfHeritage.NAME: Blessing of Heritage
${modID}:BlessingOfHeritage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength, Dexterity, and Thorns.
${modID}:BlessingOfHeritage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength, Dexterity, and Thorns. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.

${modID}:TemperingProtocol.NAME: Tempering Protocol
${modID}:TemperingProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Dexterity, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Slashnado.NAME: Slashnado
${modID}:Slashnado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies. NL Skip your next turn.

${modID}:InfectionSpreading.NAME: Infection Spreading
${modID}:InfectionSpreading.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Infection, increased by your own ${modID}:Infection.

${modID}:SurvivalInstincts.NAME: Survival Instincts
${modID}:SurvivalInstincts.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Gain X Weak, Frail, and ${modID}:Infection.

${modID}:DubiousConstruct.NAME: Dubious Construct
${modID}:DubiousConstruct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:M2! Artifact. NL At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain !M! Artifact.

${modID}:SeepingInfection.NAME: Seeping Infection
${modID}:SeepingInfection.DESCRIPTION: If you have ${modID}:Infection, add !M! *Mistakes *of *the *Past to your hand.
${modID}:SeepingInfection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have ${modID}:Infection, add !M! *Upgraded *Mistakes *of *the *Past to your hand.

${modID}:Footshot.NAME: Footshot
${modID}:Footshot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Deal half damage.

${modID}:DesperateAssault.NAME: Desperate Assault
${modID}:DesperateAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Soulburn. NL Exhaust 2 random cards in your hand.

${modID}:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
${modID}:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to EVERYONE.

${modID}:BeerFromNowhere.NAME: Beer From Nowhere
${modID}:BeerFromNowhere.DESCRIPTION: Drink a random common potion. NL Add a Wound to your draw pile. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Add 2 more. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LossOfComposure.NAME: Loss Of Composure
${modID}:LossOfComposure.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from EVERYONE. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:CocktailFlare.NAME: Cocktail Flare
${modID}:CocktailFlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! card. NL Gain !${modID}:M2! Frail.
${modID}:CocktailFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Gain !${modID}:M2! Frail.

${modID}:MagicBullets.NAME: Magic Bullets
${modID}:MagicBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Add 2 copies of this card into your hand.
${modID}:MagicBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Add 2 *Upgraded copies of this card into your hand.

${modID}:DrunkenDarts.NAME: Drunken Darts
${modID}:DrunkenDarts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: This card hits you instead.

${modID}:ExclusionZone.NAME: Exclusion Zone
${modID}:ExclusionZone.DESCRIPTION: EVERYONE gains !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Lose !M! Block.

${modID}:NicoretteBarrel.NAME: Nicorette Barrel
${modID}:NicoretteBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with ${modID}:Dead_On, apply !M! ${modID}:Soulburn to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you trigger a ${modID}:Dead_On effect, gain !M! ${modID}:Soulburn.

${modID}:WardingSigil.NAME: Warding Sigil
${modID}:WardingSigil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Weak or Vulnerable, inflict it to ALL enemies.
${modID}:WardingSigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Weak or Vulnerable, inflict it to ALL enemies.

${modID}:DesperatePrayer.NAME: Desperate Prayer
${modID}:DesperatePrayer.DESCRIPTION: Copy your hand. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards copied. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HotTakes.NAME: Hot Takes
${modID}:HotTakes.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Soulburn to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Dead_On: Add 2 Burns to your hand.

${modID}:BeyondThePain.NAME: Beyond The Pain
${modID}:BeyondThePain.DESCRIPTION: For each card in your Exhaust pile, a random enemy loses !M! HP.

${modID}:UploadTrouble.NAME: Upload Trouble
${modID}:UploadTrouble.DESCRIPTION: The first card played each turn refunds its cost and is Exhausted.
${modID}:UploadTrouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first card played each turn refunds its cost and is Exhausted.

${modID}:GhostlyFormality.NAME: Ghostly Formality
${modID}:GhostlyFormality.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL While you are Intangible, at the start of each turn, lose [E].

${modID}:SuspendingSlam.NAME: Suspending Slam
${modID}:SuspendingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a card in your hand into ${modID}:Stasis.

${modID}:RelentlessLash.NAME: Relentless Lash
${modID}:RelentlessLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Place this card into ${modID}:Stasis. NL ${modID}:Stasis lasts 2 turns.

${modID}:DataRecovery.NAME: Data Recovery
${modID}:DataRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile into ${modID}:Stasis.

${modID}:BrakingBlast.NAME: Braking Blast
${modID}:BrakingBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL ${modID}:Decelerate.

${modID}:WildBeams.NAME: Wild Beams
${modID}:WildBeams.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat per card in ${modID}:Stasis.

${modID}:ChargingPower.NAME: Charging Power
${modID}:ChargingPower.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into ${modID}:Stasis. NL ${modID}:Tick - Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL When this card would leave ${modID}:Stasis, Exhaust it.

${modID}:BronzeReinforcement.NAME: Bronze Reinforcement
${modID}:BronzeReinforcement.DESCRIPTION: *Plated *Armor cannot be reduced by more than 3 per turn from enemy attacks.
${modID}:BronzeReinforcement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL *Plated *Armor cannot be reduced by more than 3 per turn from enemy attacks.

${modID}:PlannedOut.NAME: Planned Out
${modID}:PlannedOut.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Place the top !${modID}:M2! cards of your draw pile into ${modID}:Stasis.
${modID}:PlannedOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Place the top !${modID}:M2! cards of your draw pile into ${modID}:Stasis.

${modID}:LeechingSpeed.NAME: Leeching Speed
${modID}:LeechingSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Accelerate once per 5 damage dealt by this card.

${modID}:RollingSlam.NAME: Rolling Slam
${modID}:RollingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to !M! times your *Plated *Armor. Lose ALL your *Plated *Armor.
${modID}:RollingSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to !M! times your *Plated *Armor. Lose half your *Plated *Armor.

${modID}:SiphonedSurge.NAME: Siphoned Surge
${modID}:SiphonedSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! cards. NL ${modID}:Decelerate ALL cards in ${modID}:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SiphonedSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !${modID}:M2! cards. NL ${modID}:Decelerate. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Compression.NAME: Compression
${modID}:Compression.DESCRIPTION: Spend ALL your Block to gain half as much *Plated *Armor. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Compression.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend ALL your Block to gain that much *Plated *Armor. NL Exhaust.
